body: I've got exams this week, so that't why I haven't been on it's 20% of my overall grade. Anyone else got exams?

replies.body:
I think my big exam is in April, then my finals in June.

I have photographic memory so I generally don't worry about failing exams. However, I think simple things like chewing gum can help a lot.
